forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: making a backup of your area

comments.text: you can copy your (see [-> copying your area]) and creating a backup area to paste it into. this way, you can restore it a later time.
to make the backup area unlisted, go to its area settings (the mountain icon) and click "private". this will ensure it's not showing your backup in searches.
you can also make it a sub-area of your main area for easier finding later on. to do so, click the hierarchy/ sub-things icon in the area dialog.

thread.latestCommentText: you can also make it a sub-area of your main area for easier finding later on. to do so, click the hierarchy/ sub-things icon in the area dialog.
